text:
1. Hold the flute with both hands.
2. Position the mouth on the mouthpiece.
3. Blow air into the flute.
4. Press the appropriate keys or holes to produce different notes.
5. Move fingers along the keys or holes to play different melodies.
6. Control the breath to vary the volume and intensity of the sound.
7. Follow the sheet music or play by ear to perform a specific piece.
8. Maintain proper posture and hand position while playing.
9. Practice regularly to improve technique and musicality.
